sen.j: 甚句（じんく）は日本の伝統的な歌謡の一形式である。
sen.e: Jinku is a form of traditional Japanese songs.
Jinku is a form of traditional Japanese songs.
Jinku is a form of traditional Japanese songs.

sen.j: 詳細は不明だが江戸時代に発生したと見られる。
sen.e: The details are unknown; however, it probably appeared in the Edo period.
The details are unknown; however, it probably appeared in the Edo period.
The details are unknown; however, it probably appeared in the Edo period.

sen.j: 歌詞が7、7、7、5で1コーラスを構成するのが特徴。
sen.e: The characteristic of the Jinku song is that the syllabic structure of 7-7-7-5 forms one chorus.
The characteristic of the Jinku song is that the syllabic structure of 7-7-7-5 forms one chorus.
The characteristic of the Jinku song is that the syllabic structure of 7-7-7-5 forms one chorus.

sen.j: 様々な歌詞が生み出された。

sen.e: Some of them are set in the 5-7-7-7-5 structure.
Some of them are set in the 5-7-7-7-5 structure.
Some of them are set in the 5-7-7-7-5 structure.

sen.j: 全国各地の民謡にこの形式が多い。
sen.e: Many folk songs around the country adopt this structure.
Many folk songs around the country adopt this structure.
Many folk songs around the country adopt this structure.

sen.j: メリスマ型もシラブル型も有る。
sen.e: They have both the melismatic style and the syllabic style.
They have both the melismatic style and the syllabic style.
They have both the melismatic style and the syllabic style.

sen.j: 囃子言葉が挿入されたり前後に付く場合が多い。
sen.e: Meaningless words or expressions are often inserted or added before and after the Jinku song.
Meaningless words or expressions are often inserted or added before and after the Jinku song.
Meaningless words or expressions are often inserted or added before and after the Jinku song.

sen.j: ヤンキードゥードゥル等、外国曲にこの形式の歌詞を当てはめたものもある。
sen.e: Some foreign songs such as Yankee Doodle (Anglo-American song) use the Jinku-style lyrics.
Some foreign songs such as Yankee Doodle (Anglo-American song) use the Jinku-style lyrics.
Some foreign songs such as Yankee Doodle (Anglo-American song) use the Jinku-style lyrics.
